structure.unit: Real And Personal Property And Domestic Relations

law.catch_line: Wife Of Ward; Joinder With Guardian Or Conservator; Sale Of Realty
law.text: If such guardian or conservator is licensed to sell the interest of the ward in any real estate of his wife, the wife may join with the guardian or conservator in the conveyance, and convey all her estate and interest in the granted property in like manner as she might have done by a conveyance thereof made jointly with her husband, if he had been under no legal disability.
